config.script:
#system.perspective.print("New Service Button Pressed")
	#Send the message to refresh the table
	
	messageType = 'refreshLocationsSettings'
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)
	self.view.params.row_data.Id  = -1
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.LocationName = ""

import traceback
	try:
		project = "RITI"
		### Declare parameters 
		LocationDB = []
		
		ID = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.Id
		LocationName = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.LocationName
	
		
		path = "Event/ParticipantEvents/Locations/LocationsSettingsDuplicateEntry"
									
		parameters = {"Location_Name":LocationName}
						#system.perspective.print(parameters)
									
		LocationDB = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
		
		
		x = LocationDB.getRowCount()
		#system.perspective.print(x)		
		if LocationDB.getRowCount() == 0:
			if (LocationName != "" and LocationName != None ):
				#system.perspective.print('In')
				if ID == -1:#Insert new data, no row_id
					#system.perspective.print('In1')
					path = "Event/ParticipantEvents/Locations/LocationsSettingsInsert"
								
					parameters = {"Location_Name":LocationName,}
					#system.perspective.print(parameters)
		
					newL = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
					#system.perspective.print(newL)
		
							
					
					
				if ID >= 0 :#Insert new data, no row_id
					#system.perspective.print('In2')
					
					path = "Event/ParticipantEvents/Locations/LocationsSettingsUpdate"
								
					parameters = {"Location_Name":LocationName, "Id": ID}
					
					#system.perspective.print(parameters)
		
					updateL= system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
					#system.perspective.print(updateL)
		
					
					
				## call the script to update Location Aliases.	
				participants.recreateLocationAliases()
				
				## send message to refresh the table below
				messageType = 'refreshLocationsSettings'
				system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)
				self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.LocationName = ""
				self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.Id = -1	
			else:
				self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Make sure you have entered the location name properly. Please try again.")
		else:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Duplicate Entry.")				
						
	except:
			logger = system.util.getLogger("Location Settings Edit button_save")
			msg = traceback.format_exc()
			logger.error(msg)
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong. Please try again.")

import traceback
	try:
		project = "RITI"
		### Declare parameters 
		
		ID = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.Id
		LocationName = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.LocationName
		
		
		if ID >= 0:#Delete new data
			#system.perspective.print('In')
			
			path = "Event/ParticipantEvents/Locations/LocationsSettingsDelete"
									
			parameters = {"row_id":ID }
			#system.perspective.print(parameters)

			newCategory = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
			#system.perspective.print(newCategory)
			
			## call the script to update Location Aliases.	
			participants.recreateLocationAliases()
			
			messageType = 'refreshLocationsSettings'
			system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)
			self.view.params.row_data.Id  = -1
			self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.LocationName = ""
			
				
		
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Location Settings Edit button_save")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

props.text: Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.

customMethods.name: showMessage

import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True

	self.meta.visible = False
